definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
the poor are ignored in the busiest city; the rich will find relatives in the deepest mountain
pinyin: qiong2 zai4 nao4 shi4 wu2 ren2 wen4 , fu4 zai4 shen1 shan1 you3 yuan3 qin1
containing_words.word: 穷在闹市无人问，富在深山有远亲

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 诗谶是盛开在中国古典文学百花园里的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的独行者过每天。

sentences.english: Shangluo city is among the mountains, the issue of the peasants' religious beliefs is always serious.
sentences.chinese: 商洛地处深山，农民宗教信仰问题一直十分突出。

sentences.english: The tiger carried Mr Raju deep into the woods.
sentences.chinese: 这只老虎已把拉于带入深山老林。

sentences.english: It turns out that the driver is a fugitive, who hijacks the family's car.
sentences.chinese: 凶徒劫持了这家人，驱车驶入深山之中。

sentences.english: And so my family moved to a tiny town high up in the mountains outside Denver.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们举家迁往丹佛市外深山高岭中的一座小镇。

sentences.english: Several devout nuns live in the convent located in remote mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这个建在深山里的尼姑庵，住着几个虔诚的尼姑。

sentences.english: Two students walked in the deep mountain with thick trees.
sentences.chinese: 两个学生走在深山老林里。

sentences.english: Today, they can only be found in the deepest mountainous forest areas.
sentences.chinese: 现在也只能在深山密林中才偶尔见到牠的芳踪。

sentences.english: They are all remote mountains and thick forests, almost no ways to go.
sentences.chinese: 那里几乎是深山密林，有些地方没有人走的。

sentences.english: In remote mountain, animal deity life.
sentences.chinese: 深山中，动物过着神仙的生活。

sentences.english: People don't believe, more quickly jump into the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 人们不相信，更加快速地跳往深山。

sentences.english: The small, unspoiled village is located deep in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 这个未受破坏的小村庄，座落在深山之中。

sentences.english: The pollen technique of cross-breeding in M.
sentences.chinese: 研究了深山含笑和乐昌含笑杂交中的花粉技术。

sentences.english: It's extremely chilly in the moutains at night.
sentences.chinese: 半夜的深山里极其寒冷。

sentences.english: Seeking love is like exploring treaure inremote mountains. No one can guaranteeyour success;
sentences.chinese: 爱的寻觅就像深山寻宝，没有谁保你一定成功。

definition: lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
